The narrator's statement that he has the entire lake to himself suggests that there were no other people around when he arrived. This aligns with events B and C, where the narrator describes the location as a secret camping spot and mentions that it was usually taken but was available on this occasion. Event A also supports this idea by mentioning that the first campsite was open after a long drive, implying that the narrator was the first person to arrive. However, event D contradicts the outcome described in the question, as it states that the narrator decided to walk instead of drive further, which would not lead to having the entire lake to oneself.
